name: MarsClock
0: ”Alexa, ask mars clock what time is it on the red planet”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mars clock
des:
The skill provides the Coordinated Mars Time, computed following NASA's guidelines and papers.
See https://www.giss.nasa.gov/tools/mars24/ for more.

The informations this skill provides are for informational and educational purposes only.
The developer is not linked by any means to NASA or any correlated agency.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
